original_text: Uzziah was sixteen years old when he began to reign, and he reigned fifty-two years in Jerusalem. His mother's name was Jecoliah of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 웃시야가 왕위에 오를 때에 나이가 십육 세라 예루살렘에서 오십이 년 간 다스리니라 그의 어머니의 이름은 여골리아요 예루살렘 사람이더라

sentences.original_text: Uzziah was sixteen years old when he began to reign
and he reigned fifty-two years in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 예루살렘에서 오십이 년간 통치했습니다

sentences.original_text: His mother's name was Jecoliah of Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 어머니 이름은 예루살렘 사람 여골리아였습니다
